pullrequest.title: Fixed some broken links to files in the ros-simulation repository.  They linked to the master branch, which appears to not exist.  I changed them to link to kinetic-devel (not sure if this is the correct branch to be pointing to)

content.raw: Thanks for the PR Matthew. I think that the most recent LTS ROS version \(`melodic-devel`\) should be probably the best place to get updates and maintenance. Would you mind change the links to it?
content.html: Thanks for the PR Matthew. I think that the most recent LTS ROS version (melodic-devel) should be probably the best place to get updates and maintenance. Would you mind change the links to it?
